title: Servers just go down?
body: I was in the middle of a game just now and then it started saying trying to reconnect. So I quit league and tried to reopen it and now its saying unavailable in the top right. Is this from the patch or the ranked being disabled? I was playing unranked.

replies.body:
We had scheduled maintenance for the patch deployment last night, which was announced both in client and on the [Service Status ticker](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na) prior to it going down, If you are disconnected due to scheduled maintenance, the match will end in a draw and you will not receive a penalty for disconnecting.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Same. I'm new to the game, but I'm surprised how hard it is to find patch information. Don't they usually post a notification that the servers will be down and an approximate time they will be back  online?

Ah, thanks. I did find the network status page before I posted, but I couldn't find anything saying what time they expected it to be up. I closed my client and reopened it and the patch started downloading. Thanks for the help.
It's in a notification icon on top of your client and the website.
They had to down it for the patch, it should be back up in a few more minutes.

There is scheduled patch maintenance being performed right now. It is announced ahead of time and can be viewed on the [Service Status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na) and on the notification on the top of your client and the website.

They have a site for their server status. I'm having the same problem but I hope that this is somehow useful.
http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na
They had to, to release the patch that's now out. It should be up soon.
